subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre, playing in what might have been his last game at Lambeau Field, rallied the Green Bay Packers to a late field goal for a 9-7 victory over the Minnesota Vikings last night.
snippet: Brett Favre, playing in what might have been his last game at Lambeau Field, rallied the Green Bay Packers to a late field goal for a 9-7 victory over the Minnesota Vikings last night.
